name: redistributionist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Redistributionist beliefs or policies support the idea of redistribution (= the act of sharing something out differently from before, especially in a fairer way): The president's agenda is essentially redistributionist. The party has to move to a more pro-business and less redistributionist position if it is to win nationally.
More examplesFewer examplesHe runs the tax and benefit system on an unapologetically redistributionist basis. These tax cuts are really the essence of her redistributionist philosophy. He subsequently revealed his true, redistributionist ideas.
